scripts.db: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:remigrate: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:setup: NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:seed:all
